name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Funnel Vibe Toolkit: The All-in-One Funnel Design & Funnel Building Toolkit

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Design and build better funnels with unique design AI tools, elements, and resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Funnel Vibe Toolkit: Free AI-Powered Tools for Systeme.io & HighLevel
🎯 The ultimate free Chrome extension for Systeme.io and HighLevel funnel builders, now with integrated AI assistance!

🤖 AI Tools & Support (100% Free)
AI Chat Assistant: Get instant help with funnel building questions
Systeme.io AI Helper: Specialized AI support for Systeme.io
HighLevel AI Helper: Dedicated AI assistance for HighLevel

---------------
🎨 Design Tools (100% Free)
Shadow Generator: Create custom shadows with live preview
Gradient Generator: Design beautiful gradient backgrounds
Animation Generator: Add engaging CSS animations to any element
Video Background Tool: Add video backgrounds to sections
Carousel Generator: Create auto-rotating carousels

---------------
✍️ Copywriting Tools (100% Free)
Smart Headline Generators for:

Hero Sections
Problem Statements
Solution Introductions
Features & Benefits
Guarantees
Call-to-Actions

---------------
📚 Resources Hub (100% Free)
Access to curated resources including:

Landing page design inspiration
Free stock videos (Coverr & Pexels)
Free illustrations (ManyPixels & unDraw)
Background pattern generators
SVG design assets

---------------
🌟 Key Benefits
Platform-Specific: Tailored for both Systeme.io and HighLevel
Time-Saving: Streamline your funnel building workflow
AI-Powered: Get instant help when you need it
Always Free: No hidden fees or premium features
Regular Updates: New tools and features added regularly

---------------
🎯 Perfect For:
Systeme.io funnel builders
HighLevel agency owners
Digital marketers
Course creators
Online coaches
Service providers

---------------
🆕 Coming Soon:
Additional HighLevel-specific tools
Enhanced AI capabilities
More design templates
Expanded resource library

---------------
🆘 Support
Need help? Contact our support team

Download Funnel Vibe Toolkit today and transform your funnel building experience with our free AI-powered tools and resources!
